alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Gilchrist; Suwannee; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 9:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilchrist, Alachua, Marion, central Putnam and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 958 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Trenton to Lake Delancy. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Ocala, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Trenton, Interlachen, Pomona Park, Bell, Salt Springs, Citra and Lynne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Gilchrist; Suwannee; Western Alachua; Western Marion; Western Putnam
